plot: Bhola (Sunil Shetty) a villager comes to city to meet his brother Sunny (Saif Ali Khan) who is a con-man, a Roadside Romeo, a car dealer, a thief all rolled in one. The brothers meet Sunny ...
title: Humse Badhkar Kaun: The Entertainer
